item.title: LocalStack Cockpit
item.description: LocalStack Cockpit (Beta) LocalStack Cockpit, a fully-integrated desktop experience for LocalStack. Start using LocalStack - without the fuss LEARN MORE DOWNLOAD Control LocalStack without the fuss Start and Stop your LocalStack instance with a click of a button See the current status of your LocalStack instance Easily accessible via a tray icon Initialization checks to see if your setup is correct Quick links to our website, documentation and the Web App Instant insights See runtime and environment information on the info page See available services and their status on the service page See log information of the LocalStack instance Manage your LocalStack configurations Directly manage and use your profiles (run configurations) See available services and their status on the service page See log information of the LocalStack instance Download LocalStack Cockpit Version: Latest: v0.
